pkgmetadata.longdescription: CEKit=====.. image:: https://github.com/cekit/cekit/raw/develop/docs/_static/logo-wide.pngAbout-----Container image creation tool.CEKit helps to build container images from image definition files with strongfocus on modularity and code reuse.Features--------* Building container images from YAML image definitions* Integration/unit testing of imagesDocumentation-------------`Documentation is available here <http://cekit.readthedocs.io/>`_.
